Module CST_239_Milestone_1
Package app

Class ShoppingCart

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.ShoppingCart
  • public class ShoppingCart
extends java.lang.Object
    The ShoppingCart class allows users to add, remove, and manage products in the cart, as well as calculate the total cost of all items.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ShoppingCart()
      Constructs an empty shopping cart.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addItem​(Product product, int quantity)
      Adds a product to the cart with the specified quantity.
      double calculateTotal()
      Calculates the total cost of all items in the cart.
      void clearCart()
      Clears all items from the cart.
      void displayCart()
      Displays the contents of the cart.
      java.util.Map<Product,​java.lang.Integer> getItems()
      Gets the items in the cart.
      void removeItem​(Product product)
      Removes a product from the cart.
